storyInfo: Though Kal'tsit strongly disagreed with the approach, she was—as always—willing to honor the plan Amiya and the Doctor put forth, and to offer her protection.

attributes.content: Doctor, Mantra and the others have already returned to the ship.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Your guess was correct. Someone is targeting our mission.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: This instrument is from Ægir?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Dr. Kal'tsit, can we discover anything from its remaining parts?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: No. The Ægir Academy of Technology put a great deal of care into this delicate piece of equipment—Given their pride, I'll bet they made sure no one could ever crack their Little Handy.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: But the appearance of the Little Handy itself is enough to explain many problems.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Doctor, do you remember the Joint Marine Corps?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: Of course.;The reason you met with the Ægir consul was to facilitate cooperation.

attributes.content: Both the Iberian and Rim Billitonian authorities have responded to our call. The problem is that once cooperation begins, subsequent developments could spiral beyond what we've anticipated.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: In recent weeks, the Ægir fleet has not only constructed ports in Iberia, but also established landing sites along the southern coast of Rim Billiton.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The Ægirs from the deep sea made no immediate move to land. Instead, they quickly carried out a number of operations, including hydrographic surveying, under the banner of 'technical cooperation'.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: They also quickly assembled a 'Land Patrol' through a mix of hired personnel and official partnerships, relying on more neutral intermediaries to facilitate cooperation with land-based forces.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: So you're saying the attackers are the 'Land Patrol.'

attributes.content: We're still only speculating—but right now, the Land Patrol is the only one that fits all the evidence we've collected.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Dr. Kal'tsit, some consuls don't back Clementia, yes, but that doesn't prove that Ægir is behind all of this.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: No, I am more inclined to believe that someone took advantage of the internal conflicts within Ægir.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The Land Patrol near the Iberian border, the mining ship being handed off in Rim Billiton, the mercenaries on the Kazdelian frontier...
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The breadth of their deployments and the depth of their knowledge about Rhodes Island's classified missions—that's more than enough to prove that Ægir isn't behind this.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: However, there is no possibility of a rebellion within Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: I don't believe that will happen either.

attributes.content: Doctor, do you think there's anyone else in Rhodes Island who could do that, besides us?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: That's right. No one else could do that.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Dr. Kal'tsit, the threats that Rhodes Island faces now are unpredictable.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Dr. Warfarin also warned us several times—the special patients she is caring for—their conditions are deteriorating faster than she can control.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Whether to save our patients or to respond to potential crises, we need more aggressive responses.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I've reviewed the records Theresa left in the Black Crown—she also made major breakthroughs through her work on Civilight Eterna.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I can visit Civilight Eterna to look for potential help, just like Theresa did.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: We must carefully assess the risks involved, Amiya.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: Amiya, are you sure you're ready?;Are there any other more effective means at the moment, Kal'tsit?

attributes.content: I cannot give you a definitive answer, Doctor.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But I will never stop trying. Any advantage I can gain may help Rhodes Island progress further.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I want to try.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: At this moment when the situation is still unclear, I cannot come up with any more effective measures.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: But diving recklessly into Civilight Eterna may not lead to the outcome we hope for, Doctor.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Doctor, I cannot agree to such a risky plan.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: Can Civilight Eterna link to my thoughts?

attributes.content: Doctor, that's too dangerous. No one has ever done something like this before! I agree with Dr. Kal'tsit that you shouldn't take the risk.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Kal'tsit recalls the experience of her dear friend, which is not something she is happy to recall.
Yes, Civilight Eterna can do that.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: She did it before.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Doctor, your mind is incredibly complex, but you're not the only one at risk here—Amiya could be exposed to completely unforeseen shocks as well.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I will not agree to this preposterous proposal.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Dr. Kal'tsit...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Amiya, this is my opinion. I cannot interfere with yours and the Doctor's final decision on this matter, but I hope you understand my stance.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: Amiya, I can open my mind to you completely.;We don't have to force it in one. We can give it a few tries.

attributes.content: But, Dr. Kal'tsit...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: When it's all over, we'll go apologize to her together.;It's not this plan she's opposed to, per se.

attributes.content: I trust you, Doctor.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: I'll leave the decision of when to stop entirely up to you.
Let's start after I finish arranging the defenses.

attributes.content: (Muffled roar)
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: Are you worried about me? I'm not mad at all.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Once again, we've arrived at a critical turning point. And last time… Babel met the fate I dreaded most.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: It turns out that I can't make sure everything is running on its ideal track, Mon3tr.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: (Raises claw)
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: (Rubs gently)
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: Our own limitations have begun to affect our usefulness in more important endeavors.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: We may be able to witness the changes of the stars and the untamed cosmos, but when faced with a real crisis, we're no different from any other creatures on this great land.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: (Dissatisifed growl)
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: Thank you for comforting me. I can sense your good intentions.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: (Anxious growl)
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: Yes, I suppose Amiya and the Doctor have already begun preparing to delve deeper into Civilight Eterna.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I will not interfere with Amiya's decision. She is mature enough to make the most correct judgment.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: And the Doctor... the Doctor isn't quite the same anymore either.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Maybe I still have a glimmer of hope in my heart. Maybe, this time the outcome will be different.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: (Subdued bow)
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: It is true that my own sanity is constantly warning me.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Touching the Doctor's mind again with the help of Civilight Eterna is not a sound decision, but Amiya is right, we don't have much choice.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: (Passionate cry)
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: Mon3tr, I will protect the Doctor and Amiya.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: At this moment, Mon3tr can sense even Kal'tsit's slightest emotions.
Ever since Kal'tsit's latest awakening, Mon3tr has been at her side.
Mon3tr is her companion, the symbiote she personally guides... and more importantly, herself.
(Affectionate murmur)
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: You're wrong. I do not feel hopeless, Mon3tr.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I am delighted that the Ancients overthrew the rule of the Elders, and I am also pleased that Lugalszargus set the starting point for a new civilization.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I have made mistakes out of arrogance, but I have also regained my confidence by making dear friends.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Maybe yours and my basic structures will always be alien to this land, but that doesn't mean we will always walk alone.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I've found my home, in Rhodes Island, on this great land.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I've fulfilled her expectations, Mon3tr. I've learned to love. I've found myself.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: (Moves confusedly)
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: (Wraps tail around Kal'tsit)
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: I must protect Amiya and the Doctor.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I must protect the true variable here... the future I cannot even glimpse.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I've communicated with Civilight Eterna before, yet I haven't been able to break through my own limitations.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: But Amiya can. Of that, Theresa and I are certain.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I'm sure she can pluck significance from the massive trove of data. With Theresa's blessing… she can do it.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: She is still Amiya, after all. I have seen her grow into a leader with my own eyes.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Following in footsteps, she might find some words that one left behind.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: In the past, when Originium had not yet taken shape, there was an era when luminaries competed to argue with the epoch itself. Their wonderful ideas, born of a desire to celebrate and save lives, still persist.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: All is not yet lost, Mon3tr. Terra has a chance, no matter how faint, to keep that hope alive.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: (Excited howl)
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: Me? No, Mon3tr, I'm better at memories... remembering the history I witnessed, and have seen erased by time.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I am not special at all.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Kal'tsit calmly inscribes the important info into Mon3tr's spine.
If the outcome I fear most does come to pass, if the one I least want to see stands in front of us once more—
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Protect the Doctor. Protect Amiya.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I will engrave this directive into your basic behavioral strategy matrix.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: (Agitated howling)
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: Come, Mon3tr. We still have work to do.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: If the threat does come, I must ensure that Rhodes Island is Terra's first outpost against the crisis.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: ...I will be your final safeguard.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit
